Text:
README file (included):

You just want your privacy?
Banned from the Nexus Forums?
You can't or don't want to log into the Nexus forums just to use the Mod Manager?

NO WORRIES! HERE IS A CRACKED VERSION FOR YOU!

This cracked Mod Manager will not force you to log in.
Based off the latest 0.14.1 version. (This Is Better Than The Latest 18.6 Version Of NMM. 14.1 is one of the most stable version of the Mod Manager.)

FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS EXACTLY, AND IN ORDER.

===============================

STEP 0:

A) Run NexusClient.exe
B) CLOSE THE APPLICATION when it asks you to log in! You might need to use Windows Task Manager to "Force Close" it.

STEP 1:

1) Open Mod_Manager_Cracked.zip
2) Copy "Mod Manager" folder to C:/Program Files/
3) Overwrite All and Merge All if necessary

STEP 2:

4) Run NexusClient.exe
5) CLOSE THE APPLICATION when it asks you for username

STEP 3:

6) Open CRACKED.zip
7) Copy "user.config" to: C:/Users//AppData/Local/Black_Tree_Gaming/NexusClient.exe_Url_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/0.14.1.0/
8) Overwrite!

STEP 4:

9) Run NexusClient.exe
10) This time it won't ask you to log in! Enjoy!

===============================

NOTES:

Can I update mods?
YES. Just drop the new mods into your mods folder or add through Mod Manager.

Can I update the Mod Manager?
No. And you shouldn't.

Will it ever try to access the Nexus Forums?
No. =)

Do I have to disconnect from the internet?
Nope!

Where do my new mods go?
Put your new mods in C:GamesSkyrimmods
You can also change the directory in Settings.

How do I download mods?
Download through ThePirateBay.se or Demonoid, or if you want the latest versions, download from a friend's computer then copy to your computer.

I don't see an AppData Folder!
You don't see it because it is hidden.
1) Go to: Organize > Folder and Search Options > View
2) Click on Show Hidden, Files, Folders, and Drives

===============================

Share this and end the tyrannical monopoly of the Nexus Forums!

I haz no C:/Users//AppData/Local/Black_Tree_Gaming/NexusClient.exe_Url_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/0.14.1.0/
Where do I put "user.config"?
I am stuck at step 2. when i tried to start Nexus, it crashed and a tracelog is found in my documents. HELP!

@Jchero: I doubt that you are telling the truth. I think you just work for the Nexus Forums and are trying to keep people from installing this. No one else has had this issue. Also there would never be a "tracelog" file found in your Documents folder after running an application.
I'm sorry for the misunderstanding i have given you. I thought i have to use the original NMM then crack it.
